qas.question: What type of paint tends to absorb light?
What kind of paint makes a room a room look larger and brighter?

context: In some design instances, materials used on walls and furniture play a key role in the lighting effect< for example <a0_0>dark paint<a0_0/> tends to absorb light, making the room appear smaller and more dim than it is, whereas <a1_0>light paint<a1_0/> does the opposite. In addition to paint, reflective surfaces also have an effect on lighting design.
